search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SocialBee (socialbee.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SocialBee can be found here: [https://socialbee.com/pricing/](https://socialbee.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

==================================

We are able to tell our story and share our events without spending thousands on social media management services.

![Image 75: Jason Brown](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Jason-Brown-1.jpeg)

Jason BrownDirector of Kutoa Project

SocialBee saves us from hiring a dedicated person to post on our social media profiles.

![Image 76: Bill Rice](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Bill-Rice.png)

This product is value for money, and we saved hundreds of hours thanks to it. I love it!

![Image 77: Manoj Vasudevan](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Manoj-Vasudevan-1.jpeg)

Manoj VasudevanFounder of Next Level Mentor

![Image 78: Mike Campbell](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Mike-Campbell-1.jpeg)

Mike CampbellFounder at Clear Vision Marketing

Before using SocialBee I was posting everything manually. The platform is a cost-effective alternative.

![Image 79: Kestra Peutrill](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Kestra-Peutrill-150x150.jpeg)

Kestra PeutrillMarketing Executive at SAAF Education

We came from Hootsuite. We love this new way of publishing and the reasonable social media management pricing.

![Image 80: Timothy Hurley](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Timothy-Hurley.jpeg)

Timothy HurleySenior Vice President at Cahill Strategies

SocialBee does exactly what I need for a good price — without me having to hire someone new.

![Image 81: Karen Leslie](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Karen-Leslie.png)

Karen LeslieWordPress Fairy GodMother at KISS WP Websites

The pricing suits my budget and the variation features support me in creating content in one place.

![Image 82: Mehnaz Amjad](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Mehnaz-Amjad.jpg)

Mehnaz AmjadLife Coach & Cognitive Behavioral Therapist

It has everything I need, and the price is much lower compared to other tools with similar featured.

![Image 83: John Kyle](https://socialbee.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/John-Kyle.jpeg)

John KyleWeb Developer at John Kyle Consulting

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Do you have questions left unanswered?

[**Contact us**](https://socialbee.com/contact/) or **[schedule a call](https://socialbee.com/calendar/)**.

Can I get free access to SocialBee University if I get a yearly tool plan?

Yes! Email us at success@socialbee.com after getting a yearly plan, and we’ll give you a 100% discount code you can use to redeem our University and learn how to improve your social media presence.

The course is designed by ConciergeBee’s freelance social media managers (Socialbee’s agency) with the experience needed to help you master the skills required to manage social media effectively.

The course is perfect for small business owners, beginner social media managers, and anyone who wants to improve their online presence.

What happens after my 14-day free trial ends?

Your posting will be stopped. Getting a paid plan after your trial expires unlocks all your previous settings, schedule, and content for you.

What billing options do you offer?

We offer both monthly and yearly subscriptions. Getting a yearly plan comes with a 16% discount. You can upgrade, downgrade, or switch between monthly or yearly at any time.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept credit/ debit cards, PayPal, and Amazon Payments.

Are there any contracts involved?

There’s no credit card required to sign up for SocialBee, nor are there any contracts/ commitments involved. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime – no questions asked.

Am I being charged VAT, GST, or other additional taxes on my purchase?

Prices shown in the app and on our website do not include VAT, GST, or any other additional taxes. Based on your location and regional tax requirements, any necessary taxes will be calculated and applied at checkout.

Do you support NGOs or educational institutions?

Yes! If you’re an NGO or non-profit, [go here](https://socialbee.com/ngo/). If you’re an educational institution, [go here](https://socialbee.com/education/).

Are agency plans any different than your regular Pro plan?

Our social media agency plans (Pro50, Pro100, Pro150) contain the same features as our Pro. The only difference is the number of profiles you can connect to our social media management software, and the number of workspaces and users you can invite in one workspace.

These plans are designed for agencies managing multiple clients, offering the flexibility needed for outsourcing social media management services.

Do you also offer social media marketing services?

SocialBee’s agency, ConciergeBee, can connect you with specialists who will manage multiple social media accounts for you, so you don’t have to worry about it. ConciergeBee offers a variety of social media services, including:

*   Social media content creation (learn more [here](https://www.conciergebee.com/social-media-specialist))
*   Video creation for social media (learn more [here](https://www.conciergebee.com/video-first-specialist))
*   Instagram community management (learn more [here](https://www.conciergebee.com/community-management))
*   LinkedIn lead generation (learn more [here](https://www.conciergebee.com/linkedin-lead-generation))
*   Management of social media advertising campaigns (learn more [here](https://www.conciergebee.com/ads-management-specialist))
